name: Pixit
description:
In this small pixelart game you take control of Pix, a young pixel working in the robo-pixel factory, when all of the sudden the machines that are supposed to help pixels and live alongside them start rampaging. Pix, being the only one left who knows how to stop them must reach the factory core and shut it down.

(this is just a demo, a full version of the game will be released on google play and steam if i get enough funding, as I need illustrators for backgrounds, textures and characters).

Please report any bugs you encounter in the comments. The more people contribute to debugging the faster I can finish it!
